name: COEP Technological University Pune
description: COEP Technological University, formerly known as College of Engineering Pune, is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering institutions in India. It has a legacy of innovation, academic excellence, and leadership in engineering education.
highlights: Third Oldest Engineering College in India

name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute (VJTI) Mumbai
address: H. R. Mahajani Rd, Matunga, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400019
description: VJTI Mumbai is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering colleges in India, known for its quality education, research, and strong alumni network. It is an autonomous institute affiliated with the University of Mumbai.

name: Pune Institute of Computer Technology (PICT) Pune
address: Survey No. 27, Near Trimurti Chowk, Bharati Vidhyapith Campus, Dhankawadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411043
description: PICT Pune is an autonomous renowned college known for its focus on computer science and related fields. It offers quality education in engineering and has a strong placement record, especially in the IT sector.

name: Walchand College of Engineering (WCE) Sangli
address: Walchand Hirachand Marg, Government Colony, Vishrambag, Sangli, Maharashtra 416415
description: WCE Sangli is a government-aided autonomous institute affiliated with Shivaji University. It has a long-standing reputation for excellence in engineering education and research.

name: Cummins College of Engineering for Women Pune
address: Cummins College Rd, Karve Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411052
description: Cummins College is the first all-women autonomous engineering college in India, established with the support of Cummins Diesel (India) Foundation. It aims to empower women through quality technical education.

name: Vishwakarma Institute of Technology (VIT) Pune
address: Upper Indira Nagar, Bibwewadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411037
description: VIT Pune is a premier private engineering institute affiliated with Savitribai Phule Pune University. It offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs and is known for its strong academic curriculum and industry-oriented training. It is Autonomous since AY 2008-09, valid till 2030
branches: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science (AI & DS)
Computer Science and Engineering (IoT and Cyber Security)

name: Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering (PCCOE) Pune
description: PCCOE is an autonomous institute affiliated with Savitribai Phule Pune University. It offers a variety of engineering programs and is known for its emphasis on research and innovation.

name: Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute of Technology (DYPIT) Pune
address: Sant Tukaram Nagar, Pimpri Colony, Pune, Maharashtra 411018
description: DYPIT is part of the Dr. D. Y. Patil Group and offers a range of engineering and management programs. The institute focuses on holistic development and industry readiness.
highlights: Part of D. Y. Patil Group
